content.question: <math alttext="the indefinite integral of, open parenthesis, the fraction 1 over 2 x, end fraction, plus 2 to the x power, close parenthesis, d x, equals" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mo stretchy="true">∫</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>+</mo><msup><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi></msup><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo></math>

choices.label: <math alttext="the negative of the fraction 1 over 2 x squared, end fraction, plus 2 to the x power, times the natural log of 2, plus C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mo>−</mo><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><mn>1</mn><msup><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac><mo>+</mo><msup><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi></msup><mspace width="0.1em"></mspace><mi>ln</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo><mi>C</mi></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="one half times, the natural log of the absolute value of x, end absolute value, plus the fraction with numerator 2 raised to the x plus 1, power, and denominator x plus 1, end fraction, plus C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac><mi>ln</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow><mrow><mo>|</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>|</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mfrac><mrow><msup><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mrow></mstyle><mo>+</mo><mi>C</mi></mrow></math>

<math alttext="one half times, the natural log of the absolute value of x, end absolute value, plus the fraction with numerator 2 to the x power, and denominator the natural log of 2, end fraction, plus C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac><mi>ln</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow><mrow><mo>|</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>|</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mfrac><mrow><msup><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></msup></mrow><mrow><mi>ln</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mrow></mstyle><mo>+</mo><mi>C</mi></mrow></math>

<math alttext="the natural log of the absolute value of 2 x, end absolute value, plus the fraction with numerator 2 to the x power, and denominator the natural log of 2, end fraction, plus C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mi>ln</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow><mrow><mo>|</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>|</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mfrac><mrow><msup><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></msup></mrow><mrow><mi>ln</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mi>C</mi></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mrow></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="one half times, the natural log of the absolute value of x, end absolute value, plus the fraction with numerator 2 to the x power, and denominator the natural log of 2, end fraction, plus C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac><mi>ln</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow><mrow><mo>|</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>|</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mfrac><mrow><msup><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></msup></mrow><mrow><mi>ln</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mrow></mstyle><mo>+</mo><mi>C</mi></mrow></math>

topic.text: 6.8: Finding Antiderivatives and Indefinite Integrals - Basic Rules and Notation
